evolutions.name: "Tough skin"
evolutions.description: Your cells have been modified to withstand tougher punishment. Max health increased.

evolutions.name: "Quick feet"
evolutions.description: Time starts to slow down as your reaction grows sharper. Movement speed + acceleration increased.

evolutions.name: "Marksmanship"
evolutions.description: You have developed a subconscious bond with your weapon. Fire rate increased, bullet size increased.

evolutions.name: "Bone-afide"
evolutions.description: Your torso has evolved with owl-like properties, and can rotate to face any directions. Rotation unlocked.

evolutions.name: "Helping hands"
evolutions.description: Two humanoid arms emerge from your back. Bi-directional firing unlocked.

evolutions.name: "Elastaspine"
evolutions.description: Your spine realised it is not a compass and decides to rotate freely. You can now go brrr.

evolutions.name: "Arms race"
evolutions.description: Your arms disagree with your spine and agree to T-pose to establish dominance. Quad-directional firing unlocked

prompts.mainText: "Professor, our drones have revealed the mutants ahead are faster, stronger and tougher. What will you do?"
prompts.rejectResult: Worried about your family, you rush towards the factory without any rest.

ending.0: "Look I beat the game without any mutations!" Your family walks away as everyone hates a tryhard. [You have my respect though]
ending.2: You have saved all the survivors from the factory single-handedly! Three movies and two best-selling books later, you are now the most badass scientist on the planet and debate Flat earthers on Youtube full-time.
ending.4: As you kick down the factory door, you hear an audiable gasp from the survivors inside. Still, your family still rush into your embrace. You've mutated physically along the way, but it is all worth seeing you family again.
ending.6:
As you call out to your family, you realise they can hardly recognise you anymore. Yes you have saved everyone from the mutants, but at what cost?
You decide to retire in the woods and accept to be called Big Foot for the rest of your life.
